title: Towards sustainable development: crowdsourced mapping to end FGM in Tanzania
notes:
WELCOME! This is an information & collaboration pad for Crowd2Map Tanzania (crowd2map.org, @crowd2map) 
Get involved via Github: https://github.com/seplute/crowd2map


GETTING STARTED:
	1. Go to openstreetmap.org & create an account
	1. Go to this task: http://tasks.hotosm.org/project/1788 & login with your OSM account
	1. Follow the instructions on https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B3os4Z9kDO9Ucl9NM0lTMm1pdEU/view?usp=sharing

COMIC BOOK about FGM & Mugumu Safe house (with embedded videos): http://marcellison.com/safehouse/en/#1


Please add any comments or questions you have below. What is it that you want to take away from this session? What hopes do you have? What concerns? Anything!
	* EGLE: I hope others can learn from our approach & adapt it in other countries (especially in Africa).
	*

Want to stay involved after the session? You can:
	* sign up for newsletter (leave your email adr: )
	* keep mapping on OSM. After task #1788 we will move on to http://tasks.hotosm.org/project/2261
	* organize a mapathon!! It can happen in any place & space, big or small. Just get people to hang our with pizza & OSM and things will happen!
	* other ideas? State them here: 



Learn more about Crowd2Map Tanzania & the progress we've made so far: http://www.slideshare.net/jachapman82/using-local-and-satellite-mapping-to-fight-female-genital-mutilation-in-tanzania

What is Crowd2Map Tanzania:
Crowd2map is a project born at Mozfest 2015.  We have over 300 online volunteers mapping the area of Tanzania where girls are most at risk of Female Genital Mutilation to help staff at the Safe House in Mugumu better reach and protect them. This is coupled with volunteers on the ground in Tanzania mapping via Maps.Me, a free smartphone app.  
 
There is more information about the project here http://bit.ly/FGMSOTM and here https://crowd2map.wordpress.com/ and our session will be livestreamed here https://www.periscope.tv/jachapman82/
You can also ask questions on whatsapp here https://chat.whatsapp.com/DuV7SsQcBUY12KFgAWFHMW
 
We are hoping to complete this task over the Mozfest weekend so I can take a paper map out to Tanzania next month before the start of the cutting season at the end of November.
http://tasks.hotosm.org/project/1788#
